page.title: 08Life Styles in our D-block.
page.content: Throughout our D-block people lead {different life Styles.}To find out how these Life Styles differ we went into the streets of{Bellfield,Shortlees and {Riccarton}with a list of questions. By asking these questions we found out that 45% of the families in our D-block had a{car,}but that 80% of the people held a current{driving licence. Most of the people use their cars for shopping,going to work and getting out and about.The majority of shoppers do their shopping at the{supermarkets, although about 25% buy necessity items at their own{local shops.}At weekends most people stay at home and watch {T.V.}Their favourite programmes are Soap Operas. The two most popular {newspapers}in our D-block are The Daily Record and The Sun.
